title: Unplayable lag
body: Played for years with several different ISPs, not sure if this is a Riot or Comcast (current ISP) issue. Running about 40ms for the majority of the game. However I get lag spikes ranging from 400 to 2000+ during team fights, or even dragon and baron. Any ideas?

replies.body:
Hey Everlyte,

It could be your ISP but before you check with them, why not try Riots Connection KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

That's helped with my high PING and lag issues.

Hope this fixes you up. 

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
Alright, trying that now. Thanks for your time.
